type: STANDING OFFER RFSA Request for Standing Offer
short_summary: Deep-Sea Drop Camera Technical Support Services
description: This Standing offer is for a technical crew with experience in electronic and mechanical wiring of deep-sea equipment, to support the drop camera during its field data collection as well as assistance in mobilization and demobilization of equipment from Canadian Coast Guard ships to DFO's facilities at the Institute of Ocean Sciences in Sidney, B.C.
